I think I have just the films for you! Based on your interest in a deeper, adult-oriented movie with strong storytelling, I highly recommend "The Spanish Prisoner" (1997) and "Michael Clayton" (2007).

"The Spanish Prisoner" is a clever, suspenseful film that will keep you on the edge of your seat as it explores themes of power, loyalty, and betrayal. With an all-star cast including Steve Martin and Felicity Huffman, this movie has it all.

On the other hand, "Michael Clayton" is a gripping thriller that delves into the world of corporate law and morality. George Clooney shines as the titular character, a fixer who must navigate a complex web of deceit and intrigue to right the wrongs of his clients.

Both films offer thought-provoking storytelling, strong characters, and plenty of twists and turns to keep you engaged!
